episodes.title: Encounter at Farpoint: Part I
episodes.description: The crew of the USS Enterprise-D encounters an alien being of immense power and must uncover a mystery involving an unknown space station.

episodes.title: Encounter at Farpoint: Part II
episodes.description: The crew continues their investigation into the alien being and the mysterious space station, leading to a resolution of the conflict.

episodes.title: The Naked Now
episodes.description: The crew is infected by a virus that removes their inhibitions, leading to chaotic behavior and dangerous situations.

episodes.title: Code of Honor
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew visits a planet where an alien culture challenges them with primitive customs and practices.

episodes.title: The Last Outpost
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters a powerful alien race known as the Ferengi, leading to a standoff and a test of diplomacy.

episodes.title: Where No One Has Gone Before
episodes.description: A visit from an experimental traveler causes the Enterprise to travel to the far reaches of the galaxy, where the crew faces strange phenomena.

episodes.title: Lonely Among Us
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with a mysterious alien presence that is causing unrest and disruptions among the crew and their mission.

episodes.title: Justice
episodes.description: The crew visits a planet with a seemingly perfect society, only to discover underlying problems that challenge their moral and ethical principles.

episodes.title: The Battle
episodes.description: Picard faces a personal crisis when an old enemy resurfaces and attacks the Enterprise with a stolen starship.

episodes.title: Hide and Q
episodes.description: Q returns and offers Riker the opportunity to explore his desires for god-like powers, leading to a moral and existential conflict.

episodes.title: Haven
episodes.description: Counselor Troi's arranged marriage becomes a reality when her betrothed arrives on the Enterprise, leading to personal and cultural clashes.

episodes.title: The Big Goodbye
episodes.description: The crew experiences a malfunction in the holodeck that traps them in a 1940s detective simulation, leading to a struggle to escape.

episodes.title: Datalore
episodes.description: Data's long-lost android brother, Lore, is discovered, bringing up issues of identity and loyalty.

episodes.title: Angel One
episodes.description: The Enterprise visits a matriarchal planet where the crew must navigate complex social customs to complete their mission.
The crew faces a crisis when a pair of advanced aliens hijack the Enterprise's systems and attempt to steal it for their own purposes.

episodes.title: Too Short a Season
episodes.description: An aging admiral seeks to negotiate peace on a troubled planet, but his deteriorating health complicates the mission.

episodes.title: When the Bough Breaks
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew must negotiate with an alien race that has kidnapped children from a nearby planet for their own survival.

episodes.title: Home Soil
episodes.description: The crew encounters a sentient life form on a terraforming colony and must address the ethical implications of their presence.

episodes.title: Coming of Age
episodes.description: Wesley Crusher faces the challenge of passing his Starfleet Academy entrance exam while dealing with a mysterious threat to the Enterprise.

episodes.title: Heart of Glory
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters renegade Klingons, leading to a conflict that tests the crew's understanding of Klingon culture and honor.

episodes.title: The Arsenal of Freedom
episodes.description: The crew explores a planet known for its advanced weaponry and faces a dangerous situation when they are attacked by automated defense systems.

episodes.title: Symbiosis
episodes.description: The Enterprise intervenes in a conflict between two planets where one is dependent on the other for a crucial resource.

episodes.title: Skin of Evil
episodes.description: The crew confronts an entity of pure evil that threatens their mission and their safety.

episodes.title: We'll Always Have Paris
episodes.description: Picard encounters a former lover and faces the repercussions of their past relationship while dealing with a time distortion.

episodes.title: Conspiracy
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew uncovers a conspiracy involving high-ranking Starfleet officers and a dangerous alien threat.

episodes.title: The Neutral Zone
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters the Romulans for the first time in decades, leading to a tense and potentially explosive situation.

episodes.title: The Child
episodes.description: The crew deals with the sudden arrival of a mysterious child who seems to be a powerful entity.

episodes.title: Where Silence Has Lease
episodes.description: The Enterprise becomes trapped in a mysterious void and must find a way to escape while dealing with a strange alien presence.

episodes.title: The Survivors
episodes.description: The crew discovers a planet where all life has been wiped out except for a single, seemingly innocent couple.

episodes.title: Remember Me
episodes.description: Dr. Crusher experiences a reality where people are disappearing and must find a way to restore the lost crew members.

episodes.title: The Outrageous Okona
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters a charming but reckless space rogue who gets involved in a diplomatic mission.

episodes.title: The Schizoid Man
episodes.description: A scientist transfers his consciousness into Data's body, leading to a struggle for control and identity.

episodes.title: Unnatural Selection
episodes.description: The crew investigates a mysterious disease affecting an isolated colony and its implications for the Enterprise crew.

episodes.title: A Matter of Honor
episodes.description: Riker exchanges places with a Klingon officer and experiences life aboard a Klingon ship.

episodes.title: The Measure of a Man
episodes.description: Data's rights and personhood are put on trial when a scientist claims ownership of him for experimentation.

episodes.title: The Dauphin
episodes.description: Wesley falls in love with a young woman who is destined to become a leader and must come to terms with their relationship.

episodes.title: Contagion
episodes.description: The Enterprise becomes infected with a dangerous virus and must find a cure before it spreads.

episodes.title: The Royale
episodes.description: The crew investigates a mysterious space station that is modeled after a Las Vegas casino and hotel.

episodes.title: Time Squared
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters a time anomaly that leads to the appearance of a future version of Picard.

episodes.title: The Icarus Factor
episodes.description: Riker's estranged father arrives aboard the Enterprise, leading to unresolved family issues.

episodes.title: Pen Pals
episodes.description: Data develops a friendship with a young girl on a distant planet, which becomes a moral dilemma when her planet faces destruction.

episodes.title: Q Who
episodes.description: Q throws the Enterprise into the path of the Borg, a powerful and relentless alien species.

episodes.title: Samaritan Snare
episodes.description: Picard and Wesley are captured by an alien race while the Enterprise deals with a mysterious energy field.

episodes.title: Up the Long Ladder
episodes.description: The Enterprise visits a planet with a primitive society and faces challenges related to their technology and customs.

episodes.title: Manhunt
episodes.description: Counselor Troi's mother visits the Enterprise and causes complications due to her romantic interests.

episodes.title: The Emissary
episodes.description: The Enterprise hosts a Klingon envoy whose arrival causes tension and potential conflict.

episodes.title: Peak Performance
episodes.description: The Enterprise engages in a war game simulation that tests the crew's skills and strategy.

episodes.title: Shades of Gray
episodes.description: Riker is infected with a mysterious illness that causes him to experience hallucinations related to past events.

episodes.title: Evolution
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with the effects of an experimental nanite swarm that disrupts the ship's systems.

episodes.title: The Ensigns of Command
episodes.description: Data must convince a colony of stubborn settlers to evacuate before an alien threat arrives.

episodes.title: The Survivors
episodes.description: The crew discovers a planet where all life has been wiped out except for a single, seemingly innocent couple.

episodes.title: The Bonding
episodes.description: The crew must help a young survivor of a planetary disaster deal with the loss of her family.

episodes.title: Booby Trap
episodes.description: The Enterprise becomes trapped in a time distortion field and must find a way to escape.

episodes.title: The Enemy
episodes.description: The Enterprise must deal with a shipwrecked Romulan crew on a hostile planet.

episodes.title: The Price
episodes.description: The crew must negotiate for control of a valuable space station while facing political and moral dilemmas.

episodes.title: The Vengeance Factor
episodes.description: The Enterprise investigates the assassination of an alien diplomat and uncovers a vendetta-driven conspiracy.

episodes.title: The Defector
episodes.description: The Enterprise assists a Romulan defector who brings critical information about an impending war.

episodes.title: The Hunted
episodes.description: The crew deals with a fugitive from a planet where a failed experiment has left the population with severe consequences.

episodes.title: The High Ground
episodes.description: The Enterprise becomes involved in a conflict between a group of terrorists and a peaceful world.

episodes.title: Deja Q
episodes.description: Q loses his powers and seeks asylum aboard the Enterprise while facing the consequences of his actions.

episodes.title: A Matter of Perspective
episodes.description: The crew investigates a crime that involves differing accounts of an event, leading to a complex mystery.

episodes.title: Yesterday's Enterprise
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters a time distortion that brings a past version of the ship into the present, altering history.

episodes.title: The Offspring
episodes.description: Data creates an android child and faces legal and emotional challenges regarding its rights and future.

episodes.title: Sins of the Father
episodes.description: Worf faces a personal crisis when his family honor is questioned and he must defend his fatherâ€™s actions.

episodes.title: Allegiance
episodes.description: Picard is abducted and must navigate a strange environment with other captives while the Enterprise investigates his disappearance.

episodes.title: Captain's Holiday
episodes.description: Picard takes a vacation on a pleasure planet, only to become entangled in a dangerous adventure involving an ancient artifact.

episodes.title: The Telgar Incident
episodes.description: The Enterprise is sent to investigate the aftermath of a failed diplomatic mission involving an ancient and advanced civilization.

episodes.title: The First Duty
episodes.description: Wesley Crusher faces disciplinary action when a training accident leads to the death of a fellow cadet.

episodes.title: Cost of Living
episodes.description: Troi and her mother deal with personal issues while the Enterprise faces a crisis involving an alien race.

episodes.title: The Perfect Mate
episodes.description: The Enterprise hosts an emissary from a planet with unique customs regarding marriage and diplomacy.

episodes.title: The Inner Light
episodes.description: Picard experiences an alternate life through a mysterious probe that takes him on a journey of personal growth and discovery.

episodes.title: Time's Arrow: Part I
episodes.description: The Enterprise discovers a mysterious artifact that leads them to a journey back in time to the 19th century.

episodes.title: Time's Arrow: Part II
episodes.description: The crew continues their time-traveling adventure, facing challenges to prevent historical alterations and ensure their return to the present.

episodes.title: The Best of Both Worlds: Part I
episodes.description: The Enterprise faces a critical threat from the Borg, leading to a dramatic cliffhanger.

episodes.title: The Best of Both Worlds: Part II
episodes.description: The crew continues their battle against the Borg, with Picard in a crucial role as the conflict reaches its climax.

episodes.title: Family
episodes.description: Picard returns home to confront his past and rebuild his relationships with his family following the events with the Borg.

episodes.title: Brothers
episodes.description: Data reunites with his creator and learns more about his origins while facing an internal conflict.

episodes.title: Suddenly Human
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with a human who was raised by an alien species and faces the challenge of reintegration.

episodes.title: Remember Me
episodes.description: Dr. Crusher experiences a reality where people are disappearing and must find a way to restore the lost crew members.

episodes.title: Legacy
episodes.description: Worf discovers his long-lost sister on a planet in turmoil and must confront his past and family legacy.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.description: Worf must navigate political intrigue and personal loyalties when his former love becomes involved in a political conflict.

episodes.title: Future Imperfect
episodes.description: Riker wakes up in a future where he is the captain of the Enterprise and must deal with the implications of his new reality.

episodes.title: Final Mission
episodes.description: Picard and Wesley go on a dangerous mission that tests their abilities and their relationship.

episodes.title: The Loss
episodes.description: Troi faces a personal challenge when she loses her empathic abilities and must come to terms with the change.

episodes.title: Data's Day
episodes.description: Data narrates a day in his life as he deals with personal and professional challenges aboard the Enterprise.

episodes.title: The Wounded
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with the fallout of a rogue Starfleet captain who attacks Cardassian ships, leading to political tension.

episodes.title: Devil's Due
episodes.description: The Enterprise investigates a planet where an ancient alien being is believed to have returned to claim its due.

episodes.title: Clues
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew faces a mystery when Data is found to be withholding information about an incident.

episodes.title: First Contact
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters a species on the brink of space travel and must help them make first contact with the Federation.

episodes.title: Galaxy's Child
episodes.description: The Enterprise faces a crisis when an alien creature attacks the ship, leading to an unexpected personal connection.

episodes.title: Night Terrors
episodes.description: The crew experiences vivid nightmares and hallucinations due to a mysterious psychological phenomenon.

episodes.title: Identity Crisis
episodes.description: The Enterprise investigates a mysterious illness affecting former away team members, leading to revelations about an alien species.

episodes.title: The Nth Degree
episodes.description: Barclay gains extraordinary intellectual abilities and uses them to help the Enterprise face a new threat.

episodes.title: Qpid
episodes.description: Q transports the Enterprise crew into a Robin Hood simulation, leading to humorous and challenging situations.

episodes.title: The Drumhead
episodes.description: An investigation into a possible sabotage leads to a dangerous witch-hunt aboard the Enterprise.

episodes.title: Half a Life
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with a planet where a controversial custom requires the elderly to end their lives, leading to ethical dilemmas.

episodes.title: The Host
episodes.description: The Enterprise faces diplomatic complications when a species with the ability to change its appearance seeks a treaty.

episodes.title: In Theory
episodes.description: Data explores a romantic relationship with a crew member, leading to unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: Redemption: Part I
episodes.description: Worf faces a personal and political crisis when his honor is challenged and he must navigate Klingon politics.

episodes.title: Redemption: Part II
episodes.description: The resolution of Worf's personal and political crisis continues as the Enterprise faces new threats.

episodes.title: Darmok
episodes.description: Picard must find a way to communicate with an alien species that speaks in metaphor and allegory.

episodes.title: Ensign Ro
episodes.description: The Enterprise welcomes a new crew member, Ensign Ro, whose troubled past brings both challenges and growth.

episodes.title: Silicon Avatar
episodes.description: The crew confronts a being made of pure energy that is responsible for the destruction of a colony.

episodes.title: Disaster
episodes.description: The Enterprise faces multiple crises when a massive disaster strikes the ship, testing the crew's ability to manage under pressure.

episodes.title: The Game
episodes.description: A seemingly harmless game becomes a serious threat to the Enterprise crew's control over their own minds.

episodes.title: Unification: Part I
episodes.description: The Enterprise investigates a mysterious disappearance of Ambassador Spock and uncovers a plot involving the Romulans.

episodes.title: Unification: Part II
episodes.description: The search for Ambassador Spock continues, leading to a confrontation with the Romulans and important revelations.

episodes.title: A Matter of Time
episodes.description: A time-traveling historian arrives aboard the Enterprise, but his true intentions are questioned when the ship faces danger.

episodes.title: New Ground
episodes.description: Worf struggles to balance his duties on the Enterprise with his responsibilities as a father when his son comes aboard.

episodes.title: Hero Worship
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with a young boy who idolizes Data and struggles with his own trauma after a shipwreck.

episodes.title: Violations
episodes.description: The crew is subjected to invasive mental probes that reveal troubling secrets and lead to an investigation into the perpetrator.

episodes.title: The Masterpiece Society
episodes.description: The Enterprise visits a planet with a carefully controlled society, leading to ethical and philosophical questions.

episodes.title: Conundrum
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew loses their memories and must figure out their identity and mission while dealing with an unknown threat.

episodes.title: Power Play
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew is possessed by alien entities, leading to a struggle for control and an attempt to prevent a disaster.

episodes.title: Ethics
episodes.description: The crew faces a moral dilemma when Worf is paralyzed and must decide between traditional Klingon practices and modern medicine.

episodes.title: The Outcast
episodes.description: The Enterprise encounters a genderless species that challenges its beliefs about gender and sexuality.

episodes.title: Cause and Effect
episodes.description: The Enterprise experiences a time loop that causes the ship to repeatedly explode, requiring the crew to break free from the cycle.

episodes.title: Rascals
episodes.description: Picard, Ro, and others are transformed into children and must deal with the challenges of their new bodies while solving a crisis.

episodes.title: The Quality of Life
episodes.description: The crew debates the rights of a new form of artificial life, leading to philosophical and ethical questions.

episodes.title: Suspicion
episodes.description: Dr. Crusher investigates a colleague who may be involved in espionage and treachery against the Federation.

episodes.title: The First Duty
episodes.description: Wesley Crusher faces the consequences of a serious breach of Starfleet protocol during a high-stakes mission.

episodes.title: The Drumhead
episodes.description: An investigation into a possible sabotage leads to a dangerous witch-hunt aboard the Enterprise.

episodes.title: Journey's End
episodes.description: Wesley Crusher makes a pivotal decision about his future, and the crew deals with a planetary crisis.

episodes.title: The Next Phase
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew experiences a mysterious phase shift that makes them invisible and intangible, complicating their efforts to resolve a crisis.

episodes.title: Transfigurations
episodes.description: The Enterprise assists a mysterious alien whose transformation leads to profound changes and revelations.

episodes.title: Descent: Part I
episodes.description: The Enterprise faces a new threat from the Borg as the crew confronts a new enemy faction led by an old foe.

episodes.title: Descent: Part II
episodes.description: The confrontation with the Borg continues as Picard and the crew face new challenges and threats from the enemy faction.

episodes.title: The Quality of Life
episodes.description: The Enterprise debates the ethical implications of artificial life when a new form of sentient beings is discovered.

episodes.title: Chain of Command: Part I
episodes.description: Picard is reassigned to a dangerous mission, and Captain Jellico takes over command of the Enterprise.

episodes.title: Chain of Command: Part II
episodes.description: The dangerous mission continues, with Picard facing intense challenges and Jellico dealing with the crew's resistance.

episodes.title: Face of the Enemy
episodes.description: Troi is forced to impersonate a Romulan officer as the Enterprise uncovers a plot involving the Romulans.

episodes.title: Tapestry
episodes.description: Picard experiences an alternate reality where he can change key moments in his past, leading to unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: Birthright: Part I
episodes.description: Worf discovers a group of Klingons living as Romulans and must reconcile his past and present.

episodes.title: Birthright: Part II
episodes.description: The search for the Klingon survivors continues, leading to a dramatic conclusion and new revelations for Worf.

episodes.title: Starship Mine
episodes.description: Picard must protect the Enterprise when terrorists seize control of the ship during a routine inspection.

episodes.title: Lessons
episodes.description: Picard develops a romantic relationship with a new officer while facing the challenges of command and duty.

episodes.title: The Chase
episodes.description: The Enterprise pursues a mysterious artifact that leads to a galaxy-wide race and reveals ancient secrets.

episodes.title: Frame of Mind
episodes.description: Riker struggles with reality and delusions as he becomes entangled in a complex psychological and physical conflict.

episodes.title: Suspicions
episodes.description: Dr. Crusher investigates a colleague who may be involved in espionage and treachery against the Federation.

episodes.title: Rightful Heir
episodes.description: Worf faces a crisis of faith and identity when a Klingon religious figure is resurrected, leading to a test of his beliefs.

episodes.title: Second Chances
episodes.description: Riker encounters a duplicate of himself from a transporter accident, leading to personal and professional conflicts.

episodes.title: Timescape
episodes.description: The Enterprise experiences a time anomaly that disrupts the flow of time and causes strange phenomena aboard the ship.

episodes.title: Descent: Part II
episodes.description: The confrontation with the Borg continues, and Picard and the crew face new challenges from the enemy faction.

episodes.title: The Perfect Mate
episodes.description: The Enterprise hosts an emissary from a planet with unique customs regarding marriage and diplomacy.

episodes.title: The Offspring
episodes.description: Data creates a new form of life, leading to ethical and personal dilemmas as he becomes a parent.

episodes.title: Hollow Pursuits
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with a crew member whose use of holodeck fantasies begins to interfere with his duties and reality.

episodes.title: Preemptive Strike
episodes.description: Ensign Ro becomes embroiled in a conflict with the Maquis, leading to a difficult choice between duty and loyalty.

episodes.title: The Pegasus
episodes.description: Riker confronts the secrets of a lost Starfleet vessel with a controversial history, leading to a clash with his past.

episodes.title: Journey's End
episodes.description: Wesley Crusher faces a life-changing decision as he prepares to leave Starfleet and pursue a new path.

episodes.title: The Next Phase
episodes.description: The Enterprise crew deals with the complications of being invisible and intangible while trying to resolve a crisis.

episodes.title: Transfigurations
episodes.description: The Enterprise assists a mysterious alien whose transformation leads to profound changes and revelations.

episodes.title: Descent: Part II
episodes.description: The confrontation with the Borg continues, leading to new challenges and threats for the Enterprise crew.

episodes.title: Liaisons
episodes.description: The Enterprise hosts diplomatic guests whose strange behavior leads to unexpected and humorous situations.

episodes.title: Interface
episodes.description: Geordi La Forge uses a new interface technology to investigate a dangerous situation involving a missing crew member.

episodes.title: Gambit: Part I
episodes.description: Picard goes undercover to investigate a mysterious artifact and encounters unexpected dangers.

episodes.title: Gambit: Part II
episodes.description: The mission continues as Picard and his crew face new threats and attempt to uncover the secrets of the artifact.

episodes.title: Phantasms
episodes.description: Riker experiences unsettling dreams and must confront the reality behind them to prevent a crisis.

episodes.title: Dark Page
episodes.description: Troi uncovers hidden traumas from her past while dealing with a mysterious mental disturbance.

episodes.title: Attached
episodes.description: Picard and Crusher are forced to work together under difficult circumstances when they are captured by an alien species.

episodes.title: Force of Nature
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with the consequences of a new type of pollution affecting space travel.

episodes.title: Inheritance
episodes.description: Data discovers a hidden aspect of his own origins when he meets a woman claiming to be his mother.

episodes.title: Parallels
episodes.description: Worf experiences a series of alternate realities, leading to a deeper understanding of himself and his place in the universe.

episodes.title: The Pegasus
episodes.description: Riker confronts the legacy of a controversial Starfleet vessel, leading to personal and professional dilemmas.

episodes.title: Homeward
episodes.description: The Enterprise deals with the implications of transporting a species to a new home and the ethical challenges involved.

episodes.title: Sub Rosa
episodes.description: Dr. Crusher encounters a mysterious romance involving a ghostly presence on a planet with an old family secret.

episodes.title: Lower Decks
episodes.description: The episode focuses on the lives of junior officers aboard the Enterprise, revealing their struggles and aspirations.

episodes.title: Preemptive Strike
episodes.description: Ensign Ro faces a critical decision between her duty to Starfleet and her loyalty to the Maquis.

episodes.title: All Good Things... Part I
episodes.description: The Enterprise faces a mysterious anomaly that affects time, leading to a complex and climactic conclusion for the series.

episodes.title: All Good Things... Part II
episodes.description: The series concludes with a resolution to the time anomaly and a reflection on the journey of the Enterprise crew.
